attributes.action: Make sure schools include lessons on LGBTQ and to explain to children about it.
attributes.additional_details: Children need to understand what happens in the open world and have more teaching on it.
attributes.background: A lot of schools still don't show children  life in the open world and one area that is covered is the LGBTQ community and children don't have a understanding of the community where they should do schools should allow children to have this understanding.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure which type of schools or what age-group of children you want to be taught about LGBTQ issues. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to so.

There's already a petition about LGBT+ sex education. You might like to sign this one if it calls for what you want to happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233755
